title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Board Game-Based Number Line Estimation and Inhibitory Control Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can estimate positions on non-standard number lines (364–1,364) with over 80% accuracy.
Participants achieve at least a 20% improvement in inhibitory control ability based on Stroop test criteria.
Teams complete at least 12 iterative number line estimation training projects through game-based collaborative activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
